Params: {1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory232.png'}
{1: 'Science Council Testing Ground'}
{3: 'The vast testing ground lies silent. Only the hum of machinery can be heard. Everyone is eagerly waiting for the report that is about to be deciphered.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's a schematic of the Inver-Device.", 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Researcher A', 3: "Just as I thought! It's the Inver-Device!", 4: '1'}
{3: 'He is nearly shouting out.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Mika', 3: 'This part... is the unfinished concept for modifying the Inver-Device.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She quickly skims through the encrypted data uploaded to the terminal.'}
{2: 'Mika', 3: 'A more powerful processor... Yes, this concept aligns with our current experiment.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Mika', 3: 'Look at this...', 4: '1'}
{3: 'While others are still celebrating the discovery, Mika and Asimov have already begun discussing the next phase of the experiment.'}
{3: 'But for some reason, this discovery feels too coincidental.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: '...Hey, are you still not back to normal?', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "I hope that space doesn't have any extra harmful effects on the human brain...", 4: '1'}
{2: "Ah, don't worry.", 3: '23', 4: "I've already recovered.", 5: '24'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '...Maybe we should take you to the Star of Life for a brain scan.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'I just feel like the whole thing is too much of a "coincidence".', 3: '25'}
{3: 'Whether it is the "information that shouldn\'t exist" sent by Gestalt, or the data on Inver-Device modifications found in the breach.'}
{3: "All of them are arriving continuously like dishes in a grand feast from a mysterious menu according to someone's plan."}
{3: 'Could it be Gestalt, or someone else guiding all this?'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory827.jpg', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/BgStory827.jpg'}
{3: 'You turn around to look at Gestalt. It is emitting a faint blue light, silent as ever.'}
{1: '999', 2: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory232.png', 3: '0', 4: '1', 5: '1'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory232.png'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Are you suggesting someone is orchestrating the leak of this information?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'She ponders for a moment.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "While it's not impossible... it would be too difficult to achieve this through an external connection.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "For this to happen, at the very least, they would need to disable the computing power restraint and bypass Asimov's surveillance...", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Unless the information was sent from within Gestalt.', 3: '46'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Dominik?', 4: '1'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Asimov', 3: "It's not impossible.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'But is "Dominik" really the only one inside Gestalt?', 4: '1'}
{3: 'Huaxu, "The Emperor", Gestalt, "Dominik"...'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'Gestalt has existed since the Golden Age. It preserves almost all human knowledge and civilizations.', 4: '1'}
{2: 'Asimov', 3: 'No one knows for sure what might be behind the computing power restraint.', 4: '1'}
{3: 'The terminal has blinked twice, showing a special message notification.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '...The Norman family has begun pushing forward a new round of Project Herald...', 4: '1'}
{1: 'DialogDisable'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory423.jpg'}
{1: 'Babylonia', 2: 'Norman Mining Corp'}
{1: 'Assets/Product/Texture/Image/BgStory/Bgstory232.png', 2: '1'}
{1: '1', 3: 'Lounging lazily in the armchair, Leonardo looks at the visibly displeased Teddy on the other side of the screen.'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: '...So all you can do is notify me five minutes in advance that this batch of "Heralds" is about to land?', 4: '11'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "Is this what you mentioned that day about continuing to dig into Norman Mining Corp's classified information?", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: 'Is this the "plan" you assured me of so confidently?', 4: '11'}
{3: 'He knows that his sister is already fuming on the other end without having to look at her.'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "C'mon, Victoria's been keeping a tight lid on the information...", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'She even dismissed my security guards. Now I only have a few undercover informants to rely on...', 4: '2'}
{3: 'Leonardo pleads, but shows no sign of remorse.'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: 'Even if I tell you three days earlier, what can you possibly do about it...?', 4: '2'}
{2: 'Teddy', 3: "How do you know I don't have a way?", 4: '11'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Ha, like hacking into Norman Mining Corp's database to alter their announcements? Or... simply taking over the shuttle's system?", 4: '2'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "It's pointless. Don't tell me you really think that's enough to stop them...", 4: '2'}
{3: 'She has hung up.'}
{1: '1', 2: 'Leonardo', 3: "I may have missed part of your growth, but given your current status... there's nothing more you can do.", 4: '1'}
{3: "Facing the terminal's bleak screen, he slumps into the chair, somewhat exhausted."}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Just leave it to me... I won't let you get your hands dirty.", 4: '1'}
{2: 'Leonardo', 3: "Children should trust their elders. It's my failure as an adult to have you face such a dark and terrifying world so early...", 4: '1'}
